Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Often teachers barely provide feedback (usually just a rubric and 1-2 sentences of feedback. Whereas, AI can provide far more feedback that is actually useful to improving my study.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Often students feel neglected by feedback from teachers as it is so vague and limited. Therefore, AI can help provide feedback that makes students feel supported.
